p.p: The reforestation in Samboja Lestari is now, after 10 years, of work nearly completed. However, there is still the need to maintain the planted juvenile trees and to protect them from fire in the dry season. Beside that your donation is urgently needed to support the sun bear enclosure, and to finance the rehabilitation process of the orangutans in the rehabilitation stations. The first releases of orangutans from Samboja Lestari are planned for the year 2012; for the preliminaries large sums are needed. Please note: With your donation you are not purchasing any piece of land or any rights toward this land, and your donation does not result in any duties whatsoever. BOS guarantees that the land will exclusively be reserved for the benefit of sustainable nature- and wildlife protection.
